name: THE CONTINUUM GROUP, INC.
description: Development of internal fuel tank passive fire suppression technology for DoD
sampleDescriptions: Engaging members of congress and staff on the Continuum Group's internal fuel tank passive fire suppression technology.
Lobbing activity included a special fuel tank protective technology for military fuel tanks called SCIP in the FY19 NDAA and FY19 Appropriations bills.
